metadata.title: CVE-2015-8786 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: The Management plugin in RabbitMQ before 3.6.1 allows remote authenticatedusers with certain privileges to cause a denial of service (resourceconsumption) via the (1) lengths_age or (2) lengths_incr parameter.

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
